diff_act: 4.return train data from a predefined database
5.return train data from other external source
6.communication with external systems such as the Railway Traffic Management System

regen.absent_element: confirmation of automatically entered or overwritten data by the driver
regen.new_specification: The system shall require the driver to confirm automatically entered or overwritten train data before allowing train movement.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
